Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity

Interface Anchorable

All Known Subinterfaces:
BufferedMovable, Movable, Newtonian, Placeable, SceneBorderCrossingWatcher, SceneBorderTouchingWatcher
All Known Implementing Classes:
CenteredShapeEntity, CircleEntity, CompositeEntity, DynamicCircleEntity, DynamicCompositeEntity, DynamicEllipseEntity, DynamicRectangleEntity, DynamicSpriteEntity, DynamicTextEntity, EllipseEntity, RectangleEntity, ShapeEntity, SpriteEntity, TextEntity, TileMap, YaegerEntity
public interface Anchorable

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    AnchorPoint getAnchorPoint()
    Return the AnchorPoint of this Placeable.
    void setAnchorPoint​(AnchorPoint anchorPoint)
    Set the AnchorPoint of this Placeable.

  • Method Details

    • setAnchorPoint

      void setAnchorPoint​(AnchorPoint anchorPoint)
      Set the AnchorPoint of this Placeable. The AnchorPoint will be used to set the given x, y-coordinate. By default a Placeable will use the top-left as its anchor-point.
      Parameters:
      anchorPoint - the AnchorPoint of this Placeable

    • getAnchorPoint

      AnchorPoint getAnchorPoint()
      Return the AnchorPoint of this Placeable.
      Returns:
      the AnchorPoint of this Placeable
